name: Galaxy Girls - Emilia Sneaks Aboard (pre-order)
detailed_description:
This is a story based DLC pack, it will add a new story to the game that you can play separately to the main storyline.

The story will follow Emilia as we learn just how she came to be aboard the Starlight, in this short, fun ecchi prequel story to the main game.

This DLC episode is available to purchase now, however it will not be made available in game until April 2018.
about_the_game:
This is a story based DLC pack, it will add a new story to the game that you can play separately to the main storyline.

The story will follow Emilia as we learn just how she came to be aboard the Starlight, in this short, fun ecchi prequel story to the main game.

This DLC episode is available to purchase now, however it will not be made available in game until April 2018.
short_description: Follow Emilia in this fun prequel as we learn just what happened to lead Emilia onto the ship in the first place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
